captions: Rainforests worldwide are being destroyed at an alarming rate. The conversion of tropical rainforests to pastures and croplands is causing a dramatic effect on the landscape, biodiversity and environment.
This is of great concern as rainforests play an important role in our global climate. It is estimated that 20% of the Amazon biome has already been lost and the trend will worsen if gone unchecked.
